text:
哈巴谷书 2:14. 认识耶和华荣耀的知识，要充满遍地，好像水充满洋海一般。
3. 建造教会
[redacted_name]前书 14: 4. 说方言的，是造就自己。 作先知讲道的，乃是造就教会。
以弗所书 2:20. 并且被建造在使徒和先知的根基上,有基督[redacted_name]自己为房角石
4. 为[redacted_name]作见证
启示录 19: 10. 我就俯伏在他脚前要拜他。 他说，千万不可。 我和你并你那些
为[redacted_name]作见证的弟兄同是作仆人的。 你要敬拜神。 因为预言中的灵意，乃是
为[redacted_name]作见证。
trans:
Habakkuk 2:14: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.
3. Building the Church.
[redacted_name] Corinthians 14:4: "Anyone who speaks in a tongue edifies themselves, but the one who prophesies edifies the church."
Ephesians 2:20. And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Christ [redacted_name] himself being the chief corner stone
4. Testify for [redacted_name].
Revelation 19:10: "At this I fell at his feet to worship him. But he said to me, ‘Don’t do that! I am a
fellow servant with you and with your brothers and sisters who hold to the testimony of [redacted_name]. Worship God! For it is the
Spirit of prophecy who bears testimony to [redacted_name].’"
